en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your request for this item has been canceled.

Cancellation Reason: {{request.reasonForCancellation}}
{{request.additionalInfo}}

Title/Author: {{item.title}} by {{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

If you need further assistance, contact the {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}.

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

The following item(s) on loan to you are now overdue and are accruing fines. Please return overdue items as soon as possible.

{{#loans}}

Title: {{item.title}} {{item.primaryContributor}}
Call number: {{item.callNumberPrefix}} {{item.callNumber}} {{item.volume}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.copy}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}
Due Date/Time: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

{{/loans}}

templates.description: Overdue notice for course reserves only

en.header: Action Required: Course Reserve item(s) are overdue – please return
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

You have overdue course reserve item(s) that may be accruing fines. Please return them as soon as possible to {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}.

Title/Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}
Due Date/Time: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Course reserve materials must be returned to the library they were borrowed from. 

If you need assistance, contact the {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}. 

Thank you for your prompt response. If you already returned the item(s), thank you, and please disregard this notice.

templates.name: Course Reserves Overdue Notice

templates.description: Overdue fines for returned Course Reserves materials

en.header: Action Required: Overdue fines for course reserves
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}} course reserve item(s) were returned late and accrued the following fines.


Title/Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

Due Date/Time: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}

Fee Type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount Owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}


You can pay these fines through MyAccount. Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges.

If you need assistance, contact the {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}.

﻿Thank you for your prompt response.

templates.name: Course Reserves Overdue fines on returned materials

en.header: Action Required: Fees assessed for overdue course reserve items
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}} course reserve item is overdue.

A lost item replacement fee has been assessed for this item.

Title/Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

Date Checked Out: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Due Date/Time: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Fee Type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Amount Owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}

NOTE! Course reserve items must be returned to the library they were borrowed from.

You can pay these fines through MyAccount. If you need assistance, contact the {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}.
Outstanding fees may result in suspended borrowing privileges.

Visit our website for more information regarding fines and fees.

en.header: Library Bill and Lost Item Notice
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

The material listed below is overdue and considered lost. Please return materials as soon as possible.

A lost item fee has been assessed for each item listed below. Overdue items and fines may cause suspension of borrowing and Interlibrary borrowing privileges. Returning this material will reverse the lost item fee.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}/{{item.primaryContributor}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

Due Date/Time: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Checkin Date/Time: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}

Fee Type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount Owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}

You may manage your borrowed items or pay any fines by logging into MyAccount. If you need assistance with this notice, please contact the respective owning library (do not reply to this email) or visit us in person. Course reserves must be returned to the library they were borrowed from. All other material may be returned to any Stanford Libraries service desk, Coordinate Library, or to a library book return location.

Thank you for your prompt response.

Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

The following {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}} item(s) were returned late and accrued the following fines. You may pay this fine at your earliest convenience at {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}} or through My Library Account.

If you need assistance with this notice, please contact the respective owning library or visit us in-person. Please do not reply to this email.

Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges. We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

{{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
{{#loans}}

Title/Author: {{item.title}} by {{item.primaryContributor}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}
Date checked out: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}
Fine charge date: {{feeCharge.chargeDate}}
Fine category: {{feeCharge.type}}

Processing fee: {{feeCharge.remainingAmount}}
Total fine: {{feeCharge.amount}}
Payment status: {{feeCharge.paymentStatus}}

{{/loans}}

en.header: A library item is ready for pickup
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

An item you requested is ready for pickup at the {{request.servicePointPickup}}. Please pick it up by {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}; otherwise it will be returned.

Title / Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Pickup At: {{request.servicePointPickup}}
Pickup By: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}
Owning Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Log in to MyAccount to modify your requests and check their status. If you need assistance, contact the owning library.

en.header: Action Required: Pick up your library item before it is returned
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Come pick up the item you requested by {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}} at the Business Library; otherwise it will be returned.

Title / Author: {{item.title}}/{{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Pickup At: {{request.servicePointPickup}}
Pickup By: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}
Owning Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Log in to MyAccount to modify your requests and check their status. If you need assistance, contact the owning library.

templates.description: Notice sent to borrower after library items are checked in at a library.

en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Item(s) returned:

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Due date: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, contact the owning library. 

Thank you!

templates.name: Check-in Receipt

templates.description: Notice sent 2 days after due date

en.header: Action required: Return overdue library items
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These item(s) are now overdue and may be accruing fines. Please return them as soon as possible.

{{#loans}}

Title/Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}

Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Due Date: {{loan.dueDate}}

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

Return these items to any Stanford Libraries service desk, Coordinate Library, or to a library book return location.

Thank you for your prompt response. If you already returned the material in question, thank you, and please disregard this notice.

templates.name: Overdue  notice

en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These item(s) are due soon. Please return or renew them (if eligible) before their due date(s).

{{#loans}}

Title/Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Due Date: {{loan.dueDate}}
Renewals Remaining: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}}

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

Return these items to any Stanford Libraries service desk, Coordinate Library, or to a library book return location.

Thank you for your prompt response.

templates.description: Notice to recall items, due date shortened to 7 days from date item is recalled.

en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This library item is needed by another user. Please return it by {{loan.dueDate}} to avoid possible fines.

Title/Author: {{item.title}} / {{item.primaryContributor}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
New due date: {{loan.dueDate}}

If you need assistance, contact the {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}.

﻿Thank you for your prompt response.
